targets.legendFormat: Operations that failed to be collected

panels.title: Operations Rate Limit Events by Org
Operations Reports Dropped by Usage service

panels.description:
100% means it processed the same amount as it collects.

Higher then 100% means we process more than collected. It's fine if we processed less then collected few minutes ago, but if it's continuously above 100%, something went wrong.

Lower than 100% means we lack of processing power.
panels.title: Collected / Processed ratio
